ai-tha-ap27:1.2_0: while walking along I wandered about,
ai-tha-ap27:1.3_0: My goblins grief for a month,
ai-tha-ap27:1.4_0: he is the mark of a Build;
ai-tha-ap27:2.4_0: seeing the tamed, the best light.
ai-tha-ap27:3.3_0: He has great compassion for the world,
ai-tha-ap27:4.1_0: there’s a great sage who suff there
ai-tha-ap27:4.2_0: finding nothing tangle in the heaven of sand,
ai-tha-ap27:4.4_0: He rejoices in heaven for an eon.
ai-tha-ap27:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap27:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap27:6.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap27:6.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap27:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nādika.
ai-tha-ap27:8.1_0: the fifth, the senior monk who was not a disciple of the senior monks.
